title: Jennifer, Hecate, MacBeth, William McKinley, and Me, Elizabeth
description: Being the new kid in town isn't easy for Elizabeth until she meets Jennifer--an honest-to-goodness witch!From the moment Jennifer starts sharing her powers with Elizabeth, their secret friendship is sealed. Each Saturday they meet in the park to cast spells and work on their witchcraft.Then just when they think they've perfected their special flying potion, Jennifer and Elizabeth quarrel over the main ingredient. Will it take a magic spell to make them friends again?
author: E.L. Konigsburg
